settings.title: Maxiumum Flavour In Every Mini Mouthful.
settings.content:
We will be introducing more ingredients to the entire range including gluten to 3 of our new toddler meals.
You can also expect bolder flavours, better textures, and each dish to be packed full of the plant-based organic goodness you've come to love us for.
Our talented team have created, tasted and tweaked every recipe to guarantee maximum flavour, variety and nutrition in every mini mouthful.

settings.title: Rye, do you ask?
settings.content: Here's 3 reasons why we're introducing gluten into some of our new toddler meals.

settings.quote: Having 2 under 2 has been a big adjustment for us, but Mamamade has made life SO much easier. Having a bank of healthy, yummy and organic meals and snacks that take minutes to make‚Ä¶ YES, PLEASE!

It‚Äôs so important to me that Lilah gets a nutritious, varied diet, but in reality I just don‚Äôt have time to make everything from scratch all the time. Which is why our Mamamade freezer stash has been a lifesaver! I get delicious, nutritious meals delivered straight to my door, pop them in the freezer then cook them in minutes in the microwave when I need them! üòç

Our weaning journey with Ottie is in full swing and Mamamade is taking the stress out of it. It wasn‚Äôt my favourite time with Eva, she had multiple allergies and I was worried the same would happen with Ottie. But thankfully so far she hasn‚Äôt had any reactions! Mamamade is free of the main 8 allergens so I was set up for worry free weaning

settings.title: Delivered Frozen to Your Door.
settings.content:
A parent's checklist is long enough. This is why we're here to support you and your family with nutritious, organic and plant-based (naturally free from major allergens!) meals and snacks delivered frozen to your door.

We handle the rest; all you have to do is pop the meals straight in your freezer, and heat them up when needed. Mealtime ready in minutes!

settings.title: The Mamamade Blog.
settings.copy: We're breaking down barriers and exploring the ins and outs of parenting...

settings.title: Why have you decided to include gluten?
settings.answer:
Introducing gluten to a select few meals gives parents more choide and can help encourage tolerance in toddlers. Growing toddlers also need a good balance of macronutrients - proteins, fats and carbohydrates. As carbs are the preferred fuel for active brains and muscles, including gluten containing pasta can optimise growth and development. We've also tasted more recipes than we can count and found that switching to gluten containing pasta was by far-falle the best texture-wise. Never fear, you'll still have plenty of gluten-free options available.

Allergy advice - please be aware that our kitchen now handles gluten. Although our chefs take great care when preparing all of our meals, we don't have separate areas in our kitchen, so there is still a small risk of cross-contamination.

settings.title: Do you still have gluten-free options available?
settings.answer: At the moment we are only introducing gluten into 3 of our meals so you can choose from our wide range of meals on site that are free-from gluten. We will always signpost any meals that do contain gluten.

settings.title: How will mamamade food be delivered?
settings.answer: Our meals are delivered in temperature-controlled boxes. We use liners made of wool and keep everything frozen with dry ice. ¬†Our insulation is designed to keep your food frozen for up to 30 hours in transit, so don't worry if you're not at home to receive your box. Once it arrives, you can return, compost or recycle all of our materials ‚Äî all of our packaging is widely accepted by councils across the country.

settings.title: CAN I TRY AS A ONE-OFF WITHOUT SUBSCRIBING?
settings.answer: Yes, of course! You can skip any subscription delivery, or pause or cancel your plan at any time by logging into Your Account.

settings.title: DO YOU CATER TO ALLERGIES?
settings.answer:
Yes! Since the earliest days of Mamamade, we've worked so hard to offer families a wide range of meals that would suit the full spectrum of preferences and dietary requirements.

Today, all of our meals are made in a dedicated facility that is completely free from the big-8 allergens; milk, eggs, peanuts, tree nuts, fish, shellfish, wheat and soya.

Please be aware that our kitchen currently handles a spice mix that contains mustard - this spice mix is only used in our Veggie Millet Bites. Although our chefs take great care when preparing all of our meals, we don't have separate areas in our kitchen, so there is still a small risk of cross-contamination with this allergen.

We are updating all Mamamade packaging to reflect the above, however, if you have a meal with old packaging, please rest assured that our meals have always been produced in a facility that is free from the main eight allergens listed above.

settings.title: WHERE DO YOU DELIVER?
settings.answer: We currently deliver across mainland UK - although unfortunately there are some postcodes in Scotland that we aren't quite able to reach (we're working on it!). Have a look at our shipping policy for the full list of excluded postcodes.

settings.title: HOW LONG DO THE MEALS LAST?
settings.answer: Our meals stay fresh in your freezer for up to 4 months. By flash-freezing all meals, we're able to keep your food fresh, safe and nutrient-dense.

settings.title: WHAT IF MY LITTLE ONE DOESN'T LIKE THE FOOD?
settings.answer: Babies aren't going to like everything you give them, and that's totally normal (and totally frustrating!). In fact, it can take up to 20 tries of something before a baby learns a new taste. Mamamade has the most variety of any baby food delivery service, and our chefs are constantly working to release more. So whilst we encourage repeated exposure and a bit of patience, if there's something your baby truly doesn't like, we can change it up whilst keeping things interesting for both of you!
